content.rendered:
Listening to our ideas

Deborah heads a team in charge of water meters at WMI in Saint Michael, Barbados. VINCI Mobility has assigned her to a large number of projects with a wide variety of challenges all over the world.

excerpt.rendered: Deborah heads a team in charge of water meters at WMI in Saint Michael, Barbados.
